parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: Type of wrap as defined in swWrapSketchType_e

parameters.name: ReverseDir
parameters.description: True to reverse the direction of the wrap, false to not

title: IFeatureManager.InsertWrapFeature
signature:
Feature InsertWrapFeature( 
   System.Int32
Type
,
   System.Double
Thickness
,
   System.Boolean
ReverseDir
)

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: Type of wrap as defined in swWrapSketchType_e

parameters.name: ReverseDir
parameters.description: True to reverse the direction of the wrap, false to not

remarks:
Use
IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2
and these values to mark these selections:
1 = Face on which to place the wrap feature
2 = Pull direction if Type is swWrapSketchType_e.swWrapSketchType_Emboss or swWrapSketchType_e.swWrapSketchType_Engrave
4 = 2D sketch of wrap feature; 3D sketches are invalid
